metadata.title: CVE-2017-5856 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Memory leak in the megasas_handle_dcmd function in hw/scsi/megasas.c in QEMU (aka Quick Emulator) allows local guest OS privileged users to cause a denial of service (host memory consumption) via MegaRAID Firmware Interface (MFI) commands with the sglist size set to a value over 2 Gb.

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.8+dfsg-3ubuntu2').
